description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. It's about a super-powered squirrel with bombs, in a semi-urban setting of puzzles. Somehow or another space is involved. Why haven't you played this game yet? -BetaComments: /* "It's kinda like Portal... but indie, and with this squirrel.", "I'll never again think of animal-testing the same way.", "Our guild quit raiding because of this game." */ Squirrel_Launch_Price: 80msp! (For a limited time)
